com.codecool.logger.temperature

Interface TemperatureLogger

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DummyTemperatureLogger

    public interface TemperatureLogger
    This is the logging interface. It declares the three method which the logging class have to use.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Temperature getTemp()
      This method asks the temperature value from a sensor and make a Temperature object from it.
      java.lang.String getTemperaturesJson()
      This method returns the Deque of Temperature objects as a json String.
      void populateTemperaturesList(Temperature temperature)
      This method populates a Deque with json objects made from Temperature objects.

    • Method Detail

      • getTemp

        Temperature getTemp()
        This method asks the temperature value from a sensor and make a Temperature object from it. It does not need to return it.

      • populateTemperaturesList

        void populateTemperaturesList(Temperature temperature)
        This method populates a Deque with json objects made from Temperature objects.
        Parameters:
        temperature - Temperature object

      • getTemperaturesJson

        java.lang.String getTemperaturesJson()
        This method returns the Deque of Temperature objects as a json String.
        Returns:
        a String of json objects
